comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss J. Etta Mullen of Roxbury (MA?) was a member of the "First Harvard Unit," working with the Red Cross in wartime France. Also found reference to her being National Service Chairman [sic] of the Women's Overseas Service League. books.google.com/books?id=k_cfAQAAMAAJ&lpg=PA1007&amp... Charles Allen Porter MD (1867-1931) was also a member of the First Harvard Unit, as a surgeon, and fifth president of the New England Surgical Society: books.google.com/books?id=UyXPAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA24&o...

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the info!  We'll update record.
